subject: [junit] help building test methods
msgSnippet: Hi, i am a beginner in testing stuffs and i needs ur help teting this skins of methods using junit4 and mock object(actually easymock) because i read somewhere
messageBody:
Hi,
i am a beginner in testing stuffs and i needs ur help teting this skins of methods using junit4 and mock object(actually easymock) because i read somewhere that
it make test devellopement quick and simple. I'm also newbie with the concept of stubs and i basicaly know how to use expectations
this is the skin of methods :

public boolean contains(String userName, String password){
boolean result = false;
if(password == null || userName == null){
return false;
}
for(User p:this.userSet) {
if(p.getAccount().equalsIgnoreCase(userName) && p.getPsswd().equals(password)) {
result = true;
break;
}
}

return result;
}


where "this.userSet" is a generics List. This method is called from another class that just know about the two parameters.

I'm waiting for ur help,
Thx,
Fremds
